products.title: pepsi
products.discription: PepsiCo entered India in 1989 and has grown to become one of the largest MNC food and beverage businesses in India. PepsiCo India's diverse portfolio includes iconic brands like Pepsi, Lay's, Kurkure, Tropicana 100%, Gatorade and Quaker.

products.title: fanta
products.discription: Bright, bubbly and popular, Fanta is the soft drink that intensifies fun. Introduced in 1940, Fanta is the second oldest brand of The Coca-Cola Company. Bright, bubbly and popular, Fanta is the soft drink that intensifies fun.

products.title: mountain dew
products.discription: Mountain Dew is a citrus-flavored soft drink, made by the PepsiCo company. The drink has more caffeine (a stimulant) than other soft drinks like Pepsi and Coca-Cola.

products.title: slice
products.discription: Keeping this fascination of mangoes we present you Slice which is a refreshing Mango Drink which celebrates the taste of mangoes! ... Water, Sugar, Concentrated Mango Pulp And Alphonso Mango Pulp (13.6%* Mango Pulp), Acidity Regulator (330), Stabilizer (440), Preservative (202), Antioxidant (300).

products.title: lassi
products.discription: Lassi, a creamy, frothy yogurt-based drink, blended with water and various fruits or seasonings (such as salt or sugar), that originated in Punjab, India. ... Traditionally, lassi is served in a handleless clay cup called a kulhar, and extra malai (clotted cream) may be spooned on top before serving.

products.title: appy fizz
products.discription: Appy Fizz is a product by Parle Agro, introduced in India in 2005. Appy Fizz consists of carbonated apple juice, and can be used as the basis for cocktails. It does not contain alcohol. Appy Fizz is also manufactured and marketed in Bangladesh by Global Beverage Co Ltd. under licence from Parle Agro.

products.title: sprite
products.discription: Sprite is a lemon-lime flavored soft drink with a crisp, clean taste that gives you the ultimate cut-through refreshment. Sprite is a lemon-lime flavored soft drink with a crisp, clean taste that gives you the ultimate cut-through refreshment.

products.title: Limca
products.discription: Limca is a lemon- and lime-flavoured carbonated soft drink made primarily in India and certain parts of the U.S. It contains 60 calories per 150ml can. The formula does not include fruit, relying instead on artificial flavours.

products.title: trophicana
products.discription: The perfect combination of taste and nutrition! Tropicana Pure PremiumÂ® Original is 100% pure orange juice, squeezed from fresh-picked oranges and never from concentrate. No wonder it's the #1 orange juice brand.

products.title: fizz
products.discription: Appy Fizz is a product by Parle Agro, introduced in India in 2005. Appy Fizz consists of carbonated apple juice, and can be used as the basis for cocktails. It does not contain alcohol. Appy Fizz is also manufactured and marketed in Bangladesh by Global Beverage Co Ltd. under licence from Parle Agro.

products.title: frooty
products.discription: Frooti is a mango-flavoured drink sold in India. It is made with chemicals and no real mango is added in it. It is the flagship product and most successful drink product made by Parle Agro. Frooti was launched in 1985 in Tetra Pak packaging, and is now also sold in PET bottles and rectangular shaped packs.
